import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/Login.css' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,FormGroup,Button} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import loginImg from '../assets/images/login.png' import userIcon from '../assets/images/user.png' const Login = () => { const [credentials,setCredentials] = useState({ email:undefined, password:undefined }) const handleChange = e=>{ setCredentials(prev=>({...prev, [e.target.id]:e.target.value})) } const handleClick = e=>{ } return (

) } export default Login
